## ðŸ”— Implemented By

```dataview
TABLE title as "Entity", type as "Type", status as "Status"
FROM ""
WHERE contains(implements, "F-004")
SORT type ASC, title ASC
```

## ðŸ“„ Documentation

```dataview
TABLE title as "Document", doc_type as "Type", status as "Status"
FROM "documents"
WHERE contains(documents, "F-004")
SORT title ASC
```

## ðŸŽ¯ Related Decisions

```dataview
TABLE title as "Decision", status as "Status", decided_on as "Date"
FROM "decisions"
WHERE contains(affects, "F-004")
SORT decided_on DESC
```
